tool_description: This API identify user intents in an review/feedback.
name: App Crash Review Feedback
title: App Crash Review Feedback

api_list.name: App Crash Review Feedback
api_list.description: Classify user feedback between following categories: login, screen, payment, install, slow, button
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://app-crash-review-feedback.p.rapidapi.com/app-crash-feedback"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "app-crash-review-feedback.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
